name: GrowthEscrowContract
description: Contract that locks 500K GRO then withdraw with a 7 day delay period.

functionDecorators.name: cancelWithdrawRequest
functionDecorators.description: Admin can cancel the current withdraw request.

functionDecorators.name: depositToken
functionDecorators.description: Admin can run this for the first time to deposit 500,000 GRO on to the contract.

functionDecorators.name: getBalance
functionDecorators.description: Gets the balance of GRO on the contract.

functionDecorators.name: requestWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Admin can request a withdraw amount. Can only call if there is no other request at the moment.

functionDecorators.name: updateOwner
functionDecorators.description: Updates the owner of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawToken
functionDecorators.description: Admin can only withdraw if the withraw requestedAmount is greater than zero and it's been 7 days after the request has been made.
